data.name: TYRONE vs COPS
data.detailed_description:
Tyrone was minding his own business, when the cops rolled up with weapons drawn, claiming that they had a warrant for his arrest... It's time to teach those pigs a lesson! This is a short roguelike game exploring the reality of police brutality in America.

Features
  • Play as Tyrone
  • Hold your gun sideways
  • Shoot it at cops
  • Loot their weapons after you kill them
  • Many different types of law enforcement officers, including BOSS COPS
  • Awaken the latent power of your melanin using kills from your past lives
  • Receive assistance from Federal Agents
data.about_the_game:
Tyrone was minding his own business, when the cops rolled up with weapons drawn, claiming that they had a warrant for his arrest... It's time to teach those pigs a lesson! This is a short roguelike game exploring the reality of police brutality in America.

data.short_description: Awaken the latent power of your melanin and kill cops in this thought-provoking game on police brutality in America.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 570 / ATI HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Tri Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 870 / AMD R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 (or later?)
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Linux support is in beta, be gentle with me...
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 (or later?)
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Linux support is in beta, be gentle with me...

content_descriptors.notes: TW: police, drugs, violence, firearms, blood, loud noises, rap music, feds.
